General.Name: Mistral Patrimonio Inmobiliario SOCIMI SA
General.Description: Mistral Patrimonio Inmobiliario Socimi S.A. owns and leases residential properties in Spain. The company operates a portfolio of 11 residential properties, which includes 3 free housing properties in Alicante, Palma de Mallorca, and Pontevedra; and 8 housing of official protection in Albacete, Gerona, Navarra, and Seville. Mistral Patrimonio Inmobiliario Socimi S.A. was incorporated in 2016 and is based in Madrid, Spain.
